mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mail_que ( mail_address_to, mail_address_cc, mail_address_bcc, subject, body, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{mailAddressTo}, #{mailAddressCc}, #{mailAddressBcc}, #{subject}, #{body}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT mail_que_id, mail_address_to, mail_address_cc, mail_address_bcc, subject, body, first_create_date FROM t_mail_que WHERE delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY mail_que_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mail_que SET delete_flg = #{deleteFlg}, last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser}, last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate} WHERE mail_que_id = #{mailQueId} AND delete_flg = 0
